Blood for Blood.name: Blood for Blood
Blood for Blood.fullText:
Bloodfury Hunter Attack 11Blood for Blood

Your animalistic instincts surge, helping you push your body beyond its normal physical limits to deliver a deadly blow.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee or Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength (melee) or Dexterity (ranged) vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Strength (melee) or Dexterity (ranged) modifier damage. If you are a longtooth shifter, you also knock the target prone. If you are a razorclaw shifter, you can shift 2 squares after the attack.

Effect: You can take 5 damage to deal damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier to the target.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 46.
Blood for Blood.flavor: Your animalistic instincts surge, helping you push your body beyond its normal physical limits to deliver a deadly blow.
Blood for Blood.onHit: 3[W] + Strength (melee) or Dexterity (ranged) modifier damage. If you are a longtooth shifter, you also knock the target prone. If you are a razorclaw shifter, you can shift 2 squares after the attack.
Blood for Blood.effect: You can take 5 damage to deal damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier to the target.

Bloodfury Rampage.name: Bloodfury Rampage
Bloodfury Rampage.fullText:
Bloodfury Hunter Attack 20Bloodfury Rampage

The smell of your own blood sends you into a bloodlust as you unleash your animalistic fury upon your enemies.

Daily        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee or Ranged weapon

Requirement: You must be under the effect of your longtooth shifting or razorclaw shifting racial power.

Target: One or two creatures.

Attack: Strength (melee) or Dexterity (ranged) vs. AC. If you are bloodied, the attack targets the lowest of the target’s AC, Fortitude, or Reflex.

Hit: 3[W] + Strength (melee) or Dexterity (ranged) modifier damage.

Miss: Half damage.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 46.
Bloodfury Rampage.flavor: The smell of your own blood sends you into a bloodlust as you unleash your animalistic fury upon your enemies.
Bloodfury Rampage.requirement: You must be under the effect of your longtooth shifting or razorclaw shifting racial power.
Bloodfury Rampage.attack: Strength (melee) or Dexterity (ranged) vs. AC. If you are bloodied, the attack targets the lowest of the target’s AC, Fortitude, or Reflex.

Unleash the Beast.name: Unleash the Beast
Unleash the Beast.fullText:
Bloodfury Hunter Utility 12Unleash the Beast

As your injuries grow worse, you succumb to the fury in your soul and wake the animal inside.

Encounter        Martial
Minor Action      Personal

Requirement: You must be bloodied.

Effect: Until you are no longer bloodied, you grant combat advantage and gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 46.
Unleash the Beast.flavor: As your injuries grow worse, you succumb to the fury in your soul and wake the animal inside.
Unleash the Beast.effect: Until you are no longer bloodied, you grant combat advantage and gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier.
